jobs_results.title: Mobile App developer (iOS, Android)
jobs_results.description:
This is an amazing opportunity for Developers to become part of a successful start-up who are now looking to scale up their development team. We are creating a super app marketplace, a Global e-Commerce & Messaging platform and need iOS and Android developers to bring the team up to strength before we launch the app.

Úroveň
• Senior
• Expert

Pozice
• Developer mobilních aplikací

Spolupráce
• Freelancer
• HPP

Úvazek
• Plný úvazek

Mzda
Navrhni si mzdu

Informace
• Investors In Ideas Ltd
• Praha 1

Popis pozice

Project Information

We are currently working on the creation of an international trading platform that provides not only the ability to place ads, but also an expanded set of functions for business users, including a multi-channel sales management system. The functions also include a wallet, a messenger, an affiliate program with remuneration. The project is currently at the prototype stage. Mobile applications that you will work on will have to implement all the functionality provided by our web services.

Duties
• Develop mobile applications on the Android and iOS platforms.
• Ensure apps meet Google’s and Apple’s guidelines.
• To offer technological, structural and architectural solutions and implement them.
• Provide full coverage of all applications with automated tests.
• Maintain applications, continue to develop and improve applications as new features are added.
• Interaction with the backend team

Experience required
• Application development on Android and iOS platforms
• Work with RESTful interfaces
• Payment system integration
• Mobile App Testing

Optional but welcome
• Web Development Experience
• Mobile Application Interface Development

Note: The project and aplications are developed in English. We speak English between teams from diferent countries. In the Prague office we speak Czech & English. Do not worry if your English is not perfect, cesky mluvime take.

Zkušenosti Co požadujeme
• Úroveň:

Senior Expert
• Praxe:

3 roky
• Vzdělání:

SŠ VŠ VŠ student

Pozice

Jazyky
Anglicky – čtení dokumentace

Práce u nás Co nabízíme

Jaké jsou benefity

We offer
• Salary/pay above average
• Quarterly review of your salary/pay
• Bonus when starting the project
• Working in smaller friendly international team
• The ability to use technology, libraries and frameworks of your choice

jobs_results.title: iOS Software Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Who Are We?

We are a team that brought you Norton, Avast, LifeLock, Avira, AVG, ReputationDefender, and CCleaner, dedicated to providing cybersecurity, privacy, and identity protection to over 500 million users in 150 countries. At Gen, we offer flexible working options, generous time off, and competitive benefits in a diverse and inclusive environment where every team member is valued and celebrated. If you are smart, fearless, and dedicated, join us to power Digital Freedom and help consumers take control of their digital lives.

Disclaimer:

This is not an active position, and you are joining our talent pool. Joining our talent pool means we’ll keep you in mind when opportunities arise in the future.

Mission

We’re on the lookout for talented mobile developers who are passionate about building secure and innovative solutions for our customers. While this isn’t an active role at the moment, we’re creating a talent pool of amazing individuals so we’re ready to connect when the right opportunity comes along.

Opportunity

This role is all about being part of a team that crosses borders—Czechia, Ireland, Romania, Slovakia, and the US—to create meaningful, impactful work. Here’s what you can expect:
• Collaborate in small, focused teams to brainstorm and test fresh ideas for customer solutions.
• Develop mobile apps that are not only scalable and robust but also trusted by users worldwide.
• Dive into exciting challenges in mobile security and privacy, bringing your creativity and expertise to the table.
• Stay ahead of the curve by exploring and implementing the latest technologies.

Objectives
• Participate in Agile practices like sprint planning, retrospectives, and stand-ups to keep the momentum going.
• Build and deliver high-quality mobile software and testing tools step by step.
• Use your architectural skills to create solutions that last.
• Collaborate with your peers through code and design reviews to continuously grow and improve.
• Debug, solve problems, and refine your skills individually and as part of a team.
• Share knowledge and tools to help the whole team succeed.
• Present your work in agile meetings with confidence and clarity.

Competencies
• Strong experience developing iOS apps, with a solid foundation in building scalable software.
• Passionate about clean, maintainable code and high-quality development practices.
• Skilled in Swift (and SwiftUI is a bonus!).
• Experience with automated testing and CI tools like TeamCity is a plus.
• A degree in computer science or equivalent hands-on experience.
• Excellent communication skills and a genuine team player who values collaboration.
• Driven by meaningful work that makes the world more secure.
• Empathy for users and teammates alike, coupled with a hunger to learn and grow.

Culture
• Join a team that values collaboration, innovation, and constantly pushing boundaries.
• Work in an environment where your ideas and contributions are respected and make a difference.

Disclaimer:

This is not an active position. Joining our talent pool means we’ll keep you in mind when opportunities arise in the future.

Gen is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive and accessible environment for all employees. All employment decisions are based on merit, experience, and business needs, without regard to race, color, national origin, age, religion, sex, pregnancy (including childbirth or related medical conditions), genetic information, disability (physical or mental), medical condition, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity or gender expression, military or veteran status, or any other consideration made unlawful by federal, state, or local law. Gen strictly prohibits unlawful discrimination based on such protected characteristics and seeks to recruit the most talented candidates from diverse cultures and backgrounds.

We also consider employment-qualified individuals with arrest and conviction records. In addition, we will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Learn more about pay transparency.

Gen complies with all anti-discrimination laws.

To conform to U.S. export control regulations, applicant should be eligible for any required authorizations from the U.S. Government.

jobs_results.title: iOS developer
jobs_results.description:
Koho hledáme
• Schopného programátora, kterému je cennější vyvíjet a rozvíjet jednu aplikaci, než desítky komerčních nástrojů
• Osobu, která by se ráda podílela na inovativním nástroji
• Pozitivně nabitou osobnost, která se nebojí inovací a neprozkoumaného, technologií neposvěceného trhu
• Vývojáře, kteří jsou v oblasti vývoje mobilních aplikací jako ryby ve vodě
• Člověka s přehledem v aktuálních trendech vývoje aplikací, přehled v oblasti UX pro iOS

Co nabízíme
• Možnost částečné práce z domova po domluvě a vzájemném poznání se
• Svou kancelář v Praze s kompletním zázemím
• Motivující platové ohodnocení a možnost pracovat na DPP nebo ŽL
• Přátelská atmosféra, zázemí naší společnosti

Máš zájem?

Vykašli se na CV a pošlete nám nějakou svou aplikaci nebo ukázku kódu. A místo motivačního dopisu si s námi přijďte popovídat nebo zajít na pivko. Jde nám o dovednosti a chuti učit se!

jobs_results.title: Highly Skilled iOS Developer for Innovative Projects
jobs_results.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled iOS developer to join our team in Wrocław or remotely. As a key member of our development team, you will play a vital role in the growth and maintenance of innovative solutions for a dynamic industry.
Key Responsibilities:
• Develop new features and maintain existing functionality to ensure the highest standards of code quality.
• Collaborate with our team dedicated to collaboration and excellence to deliver high-quality applications.
Requirements:

To be successful in this role, you should have:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
• At least 3 years of experience in iOS development using Swift.
• Experience with UIKit and SwiftUI.
• Strong knowledge of design patterns (MVVM, MVP, Unidirectional Flow).
• Familiarity with Scrum methodologies.
• Expertise in Bluetooth, REST APIs, and GraphQL.
• Experience with unit testing.
About the Role:

This is a full-time position, and you will work on a well-maintained application with high code standards. You will also enjoy a range of benefits, including:
• A competitive salary estimated at around €60,000 - €80,000 per year.
• Sport subscription, private healthcare, life & group insurance.

Join us and contribute to the growth and success of our company.

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer (ios)
jobs_results.description:
Bloomreach is the world’s #1 Commerce Experience Cloud, empowering brands to deliver customer journeys so personalized, they feel like magic. It offers a suite of products that drive true personalization and digital commerce growth, including:
• Discovery, offering AI-driven search and merchandising
• Content, offering a headless CMS
• Engagement, offering a leading CDP and marketing automation solutions

Together, these solutions combine the power of unified customer and product data with the speed and scale of AI optimization, enabling revenue-driving digital commerce experiences that convert on any channel and every journey. Bloomreach serves over 850 global brands including Albertsons, Bosch, Puma, FC Bayern München, and Marks & Spencer. Bloomreach recently raised $175 million in a Series F funding round, bringing its total valuation to $2.2 billion. The investment was led by Goldman Sachs Asset Management with participation from Bain Capital Ventures and Sixth Street Growth. For more information, visit Bloomreach.com.

Are you looking for a cutting-edge tech stack to work with and to make an impact on a daily basis? We are currently forming a team of mobile engineers dedicated to developing and maintaining Mobile SDKs for our customers and we are looking for a new colleague to join as a Senior Software Engineer for Mobile (iOS) SDK. The salary range starts at 3500€ per month, along with restricted stock units and other benefits. Working in one of our Central European offices or from home on a full-time basis, you‘ll become a core part of the Engineering Team.

What challenge awaits you?

As a Senior Software Engineer for Mobile (iOS) SDK at our company, you'll encounter exciting, high-end technical challenges. You'll be part of a team that delivers innovative features, enabling our clients to build powerful mobile applications using Mobile SDKs on their preferred platforms (iOS, Android, React Native, Flutter, MAUI). These SDKs track user behavior and provide capabilities to deliver personalized content. You’ll work on implementing and extending components that provide features like push notifications, in-app messaging, tracking, dynamic rendering, and many more.

Your job will be to:
• Design & Deliver new features
• Ensure quality and compatibility
• Support and Maintain owned components
• Design & Deliver new features
• Translate business requirements for product features into detailed technical specifications and comprehensive design documents.
• Define and develop new features with a strong emphasis on quality, usability, and performance.
• Build, publish and monitor new versions of Mobile SDKs, ensuring seamless adoption.
• Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to incorporate best practices into the development process.
• Ensure quality and compatibility
• Implement robust testing, and validation processes to ensure the reliability and stability of the new features.
• Measure and tune client-side performance of our features.
• Continuously improve the technical quality and ease of use of Mobile SDKs. ● Make sure we utilize all the mobile technologies in the best way - ensuring our Mobile SDKs are functional, secure and high performance.
• Conduct regular code reviews and use static code analysis tools to maintain high code quality.
• Collaborate with QA engineers to develop comprehensive test plans and automated tests.
• Support and Maintain owned components
• Provide ongoing support and maintenance for existing features, including troubleshooting issues, fixing bugs, and implementing enhancements. ● Support our client-facing colleagues in the investigation of possible issues (L3 support).
• Document code including guides, configuration instructions, feature descriptions, design decisions, and operational procedures to facilitate ongoing maintenance and knowledge sharing.
• Utilize feedback from users and stakeholders to continually improve the functionality and usability of Mobile SDKs.

What tech stack do we have for you?

Main Tech Stack:
• Native iOS: Swift, Carthage, CocoaPods, Swift Package Manager, Fastlane, Quick (Nimble, Mockingjay)

Extended Tech Stack:
• Native Android: Kotlin, Maven, Gradle, Google Services, JaCoCo, JUnit, Robolectric
• React Native Wrapper (iOS & Android): React Native, JavaScript & TypeScript, CocoaPods, Yarn, npm, Babel, Jest
• Flutter Wrapper (iOS & Android): Flutter, Dart, CocoaPods
• MAUI Wrapper (iOS & Android): C# & .NET, NUnit

Common Tech Stack:
• Software & Tools - Grafana, Sentry, GitHub, GitLab, Jira, Productboard

While we don’t expect you to work actively with all SDKs, the ability to cover more than one would be a welcomed advantage.

You will be developing new features and maintaining the codebase to ensure compatibility with different versions. Therefore, you should be passionate about new features in mobile technologies, and be keen to investigate how personalization may work in the context of today's privacy-focused digital world.

The Mobile SDKs are being integrated with internal APIs written in Golang, which run on top of Kubernetes and Google Cloud owned by a different team. You will not be expected to actively contribute, but a sense of understanding will be an advantage.

Your success story will be:
• In 30 Days: Successfully onboard, get familiar with Mobile SDKs, and contribute to ongoing tasks, demonstrating understanding of the codebase and team processes.
• In 90 Days: Contribute to design discussions and independently deliver high-quality code for assigned features. Participate in investigating and resolving production issues.
• In 180 Days: Independently manage larger tasks, contribute to team improvements, and confidently handle L3 support, investigating and resolving production issues.

You have the following experience and qualities:
• Professional — Proven experience in native mobile development (iOS), knowledge of wrappers, mobile ecosystem, system design, and maintenance. 2. Personal — Demonstrates strong initiative, ability to work within a team, communication skills, and a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.

Professional experience
• Proven experience in the area of iOS mobile development, which is essential for building Mobile SDKs.
• Overview of technologies and programming languages used for wrapping mobile applications (for example: React Native, Flutter).
• Solid understanding of the mobile development ecosystem. An experience in building libraries or SDKs is an advantage. Familiarity with the build and publishing of mobile applications.
• Experience with dynamic rendering would be a valued asset.
• Experience with version control systems (Git) and CI/CD pipelines. We utilize Git for code management and CI/CD pipelines for efficient development and deployment.

Personal qualities
• Demonstrates strong initiative and a proactive approach to problem-solving. ● Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively within a team.
• A genuine passion for learning new technologies and keeping up-to-date with the latest advancements.
• A commitment to delivering high-quality work and a dedication to continuous improvement.

More things you'll like about Bloomreach:

Culture:
• A great deal of freedom and trust. At Bloomreach we don’t clock in and out, and we have neither corporate rules nor long approval processes. This freedom goes hand in hand with responsibility. We are interested in results from day one.
• We have defined our 5 values and the 10 underlying key behaviors that we strongly believe in. We can only succeed if everyone lives these behaviors day to day. We've embedded them in our processes like recruitment, onboarding, feedback, personal development, performance review and internal communication.
• We believe in flexible working hours to accommodate your working style.
• We work remote-first with several Bloomreach Hubs available across three continents.
• We organize company events to experience the global spirit of the company and get excited about what's ahead.
• We encourage and support our employees to engage in volunteering activities - every Bloomreacher can take 5 paid days off to volunteer\*.
• The Bloomreach Glassdoor page elaborates on our stellar 4.6/5 rating. The Bloomreach Comparably page Culture score is even higher at 4.9/5

Personal Development:
• We have a People Development Program -- participating in personal development workshops on various topics run by experts from inside the company. We are continuously developing & updating competency maps for select functions.
• Our resident communication coach Ivo Večeřa is available to help navigate work-related communications & decision-making challenges.\*
• Our managers are strongly encouraged to participate in the Leader Development Program to develop in the areas we consider essential for any leader. The program includes regular comprehensive feedback, consultations with a coach and follow-up check-ins.
• Bloomreachers utilize the $1,500 professional education budget on an annual basis to purchase education products (books, courses, certifications, etc.)\*

Well-being:
• The Employee Assistance Program -- with counselors -- is available for non-work-related challenges.\*
• Subscription to Calm - sleep and meditation app.\*
• We organize ‘DisConnect’ days where Bloomreachers globally enjoy one additional day off each quarter, allowing us to unwind together and focus on activities away from the screen with our loved ones.
• We facilitate sports, yoga, and meditation opportunities for each other.
• Extended parental leave up to 26 calendar weeks for Primary Caregivers.\*

Compensation:
• Restricted Stock Units or Stock Options are granted depending on a team member’s role, seniority, and location.\*
• Everyone gets to participate in the company's success through the company performance bonus.\*
• We offer an employee referral bonus of up to $3,000 paid out immediately after the new hire starts.
• We reward & celebrate work anniversaries -- Bloomversaries!\*

(\*Subject to employment type. Interns are exempt from marked benefits, usually for the first 6 months.)

Excited? Join us and transform the future of commerce experiences!

If this position doesn't suit you, but you know someone who might be a great fit, share it - we will be very grateful!

Any unsolicited resumes/candidate profiles submitted through our website or to personal email accounts of employees of Bloomreach are considered property of Bloomreach and are not subject to payment of agency fees.

#LI-Remote

jobs_results.title: Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
jobs_results.description:
Computer Scientist (m/f/d) as App Developer for iOS / Android
RIWA - All geoinformation becomes a digital experience

RIWA GmbH is a leading company in the field of geoinformation and municipal specialist processes with over 25 years of experience and market leader in Bavaria. Our team develops innovative solutions for the digital transformation of cities and municipalities, in particular through geographic information systems (GIS). We also create digital twins of municipalities for construction planning, energy management and sustainable urban development. We offer customized solutions and attach great importance to close cooperation.

Become part of our team in one of our branches in Augsburg, Memmingen or Kempten im AllgÃ¤u. After training, you can also work from home.
These are your tasks
• Further development of our native RIWA GIS Android app
• Implementation of our previous apps for Apple iOS with Kotlin & Compose Multiplatform
• Quality assurance through code reviews, unit tests and automated test procedures
• Technical conceptualization of functional requirements from product management
• Advising product management on development issues
You know your way around this
• Completed studies in computer science or equivalent training
• Sound knowledge in the development of Android apps (Kotlin, Java, Android SDK). Basic knowledge of iOS development advantageous (Swift)
• Ideally experience with Jetpack Compose, Kotlin Multiplatform and Compose Multiplatform
• Expertise with automated tests, CI/CD processes and agile software development
• Knowledge of designing appealing user interfaces is a plus
• Independent working style, ability to work in a team and a high level of self-motivation
What we offer you
• A great team - #GernePerDu - and a varied job in the office and home office
• Attractive salary, 13 monthly salaries, capital-forming benefits and a performance bonus
• Family-friendly working time models with flexible working hours (flexitime)
• Corporate benefits such as a job bike, drinks flat rate or employee discounts with over 1,500 providers
• Intensive training in the field of activity and regular further training
• An exciting environment with varied tasks
• A secure, modern workplace close to the city center with future prospects
Have we piqued your interest?

Please send us your complete application documents directly online via our applicant management system, stating your salary expectations and the earliest possible starting date.
RIWA GmbH

An der NeumÃ¼hle 5, 87700 Memmingen
Everyone is welcome at RIWA. Diversity and equal opportunities are an integral part of our company. We see the uniqueness of each individual, and therefore the diversity of our teams, as the driving force behind our daily work and innovations. - We look forward to meeting you.

+

Online application

jobs_results.title: iOS & Android Developer
jobs_results.description:
Jak vypadá náš IT tým?

Nových technologií se nebojíme a snažíme se držet aktuálních verzí. Na Androidu stavíme aplikace výhradně na Jetpack Compose, zatímco na iOS postupně přecházíme na SwiftUI. Součástí naší práce je také pravidelný prostor na refactoring a odstraňování technologického dluhu, což nám pomáhá udržet vysokou kvalitu kódu a aplikací.

Na čem aktuálně pracujeme?

Společně vyvíjíme naši eshopovou mobilní aplikaci, která pro nás není jen chudým bráchou k webovému řešení. Používají ji desítky procent našich zákazníků. Za vše mluví průměrné hodnocení 4,8 a více než 50 000 hodnocení na obou platformách dohromady.

Jako první v ČR jsme také implementovali platbu Apple Pay nebo umožnili našim zákazníkům sledovat Pilulka Auto během doručení, podobně jako taxi při objednání Uberu. Zaplatit bitcoinem je u nás také samozřejmostí.

Jakou další technologickou inovaci společně vymyslíme?

Dále u nás najdeš vývojáře pro rozvoj eshopového řešení, interního backoffice systému (CRM, ERP), business inteligence a Vendor management systému, kteří primárně pracují v PHP, JS, Pythonu, GoLangu.

Co od tebe očekáváme - iOS?
• Alespoň 2 letá zkušenost s tvorbou mobilních aplikací na iOS
• Výborná znalost programovacího jazyka Swift a XCode
• Při tvorbě UITableViews a UICollectionViews se cítíš jako ryba ve vodě
• Znalost SwiftUI výhodou

Nejdůležitější pro nás je proto analytické myšlení, ochota učit se novým věcem a chuť do práce.

Co od tebe očekáváme - Android?
• Alespoň 2 letá zkušenost s tvorbou mobilních aplikací na Android
• Výborná znalost Kotlinu
• Výborná znalost Android SDK
• Dobrá znalost Kotlin Flow
• Dobrá znalost Kotlin Coroutines
• Dobrá znalost MVVM architektury
• Výhodou znalost Jetpack Compose

Nejdůležitější pro nás je proto analytické myšlení, ochota učit se novým věcem a chuť do práce.

Co ti můžeme nabídnout dál?
• Možnost částečný remote s občasným dojížděním do kanceláří, důležitá je pro nás odvedená práce, nikoliv vyplněné píchačky
• Neformální firemní kulturu
• Máme rádi transparentnost, upřímnost, lidskost a rychlá efektivní řešení, svůj názor můžeš říct upřímně komukoliv ve firmě
• Lekce cizích jazyků - English, Deutsch, Español? :)
• Příspěvek na Multisportku.
• Kanceláře jen pár minut chůze od metra Palmovka nebo Českomoravská
• Dog friendly office
• Každé úterý Ti přichystáme hromadu ovoce k snídani
• Společné firemní akce (hory, voda, kultura, běžecké závody a spousta jiných zážitků) i IT teambuildingy, naposledy to byla návštěva pivovaru Trautenberk a výstup na Sněžku
• Slevy na sortiment z naší nabídky
• Dbáme na správně vyvážený work-life balanc, protože je win-win pro obě strany

Pokud se k nám chceš připojit, tak se ozvi, nebo pošli odkaz na LindkedIn.

Těšíme se na tebe :)

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Developer - Spanish/English - Full Remote
iOS Application Developer Position
jobs_results.description:
Job Opportunity

We are seeking a skilled iOS Developer to verify the quality of our documentation. The goal of our team is to deliver software for navigation systems, work on mobile SDKs, and provide drivers with the best possible user experience and best-in-class APIs for our SDKs.

This project involves offering solutions for developing maps and navigation applications using XCode and Swift.

You will be working with a team of unique, curious, and passionate problem solvers who share your passion for innovation and collaboration.

About Experis Polska:

We are a global leader in specialized recruitment and management consulting within IT. Our company offers competitive job opportunities and engaging IT projects for both experienced experts and those just starting their career in IT.

We specialize in recruiting managers and high-skilled consultants with expertise in IT. Experis is part of the ManpowerGroup and has been recognized as one of the most ethical companies worldwide.
Key Responsibilities:
• Test public Navigation SDK documentation
• Validate the quality of documentation

Requirements:
• iOS development skills
• Experience with SDKs and XCode
• Proficiency in Swift programming language
• Ability to work remotely

Compensation Package: The estimated hourly salary for this position is 80 PLN per hour. This is a part-time opportunity requiring 2 hours of work per week for 1 month with the possibility of extension or conversion to a full-time contract.
